frame_eqs_str:
m.wave_r=((m.wave_r+(0.25*Math.sin((1.4*m.time))))+(0.25*Math.sin((2.25*m.time)))); m.wave_g=((m.wave_g+(0.25*Math.sin((1.7*m.time))))+(0.25*Math.sin((2.11*m.time)))); m.wave_b=((m.wave_b+(0.25*Math.sin((1.84*m.time))))+(0.25*Math.sin((2.3*m.time)))); m.warp=0; m.ob_r=(m.ob_r+m.wave_b); m.ob_g=(m.ob_g+m.wave_r); m.ob_b=(m.ob_b+m.wave_g); m.ib_r=(m.ib_r+m.wave_r); m.ib_b=(m.ib_b+m.wave_b); m.ib_g=(m.ib_g+m.wave_g);
		m.rkeys = ['thresh','dx_r','dy_r','rot','zoom','dx','dy'];
pixel_eqs_str: m.thresh=((above(m.bass_att, m.thresh)*2)+((1-above(m.bass_att, m.thresh))*(((m.thresh-1.3)*0.96)+1.3))); m.dx_r=(((equal(m.thresh, 2)*0.015)*Math.sin((5*m.time)))+((1-equal(m.thresh, 2))*m.dx_r)); m.dy_r=(((equal(m.thresh, 2)*0.015)*Math.sin((6*m.time)))+((1-equal(m.thresh, 2))*m.dy_r)); m.rot=(m.rot+(0.2*(((0.36*Math.sin((m.rad-div(0.22,Math.abs(((m.rad*2)+div(m.bass,m.time)))))))*0.4)-(div(m.treb,1.3)*Math.cos(m.bass_att))))); m.zoom=(m.zoom-(0.03*Math.abs((Math.sin(((m.bass*m.time)+(52*m.rad)))-Math.cos(((0.3*m.bass)-m.mid_att)))))); m.zoom=(m.zoom-(0.052*(0.5*Math.abs((((-0.2*m.bass)*m.rot)-div((3*((0.5-Math.cos((0.5*m.rot)))-m.rad)),2)))))); m.dx=(m.dx+((1.5*Math.cos(m.zoom))*m.dx_r)); m.dy=(m.dy+((1.5*Math.sin(m.zoom))*m.dy_r)); m.rot=((equal(m.bass, 0)!=0)?(0):(m.rot)); m.zoom=((equal(m.bass, 0)!=0)?(0):(m.zoom));
